alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian and southern Le Flore Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 915 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Lake Wister State Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Heavener... Mansfield... Wister... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Midland... Cameron... Big Cedar... Lake Wister State Park... Patterson... Arkola... Crossroads... Witcherville... Summerfield... Dayton... Heavener Runestone Park... Hodgen... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
